requirements: All interactive elements must have data-testid
Focus states must be visible and high contrast
Do not rely on color alone for status

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' aesthetic (generic centered layouts, uniform styling)
Use dark colors independently, avoid dark gradients
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
DO NOT apply universal transition (transition: all)
DO NOT center align the app container
Always use modern button styles (pill-shaped or sharp)
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays are recommended
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the design using the specified colors, fonts, and components. Prioritize the 'Electric & Neon' vibe. Use the provided image URLs for the landing page. Ensure the chat interface is dense and functional ('Control Room' grid) while the landing page is expressive ('Tetris' grid). Use Shadcn components for complex interactions but customize them to match the design system.
